00008 #ifndef _VTIMER_H
00009 #define _VTIMER_H
00010 
00011 #include <string>
00012 #include <ctime>
00013 #include <iostream>
00014 
00015 using std::string;
00016 using std::cout;
00017 using std::endl;
00018 
00019 class VTimer{
00020 public:
00021     VTimer(const string& title = "[Null]") : title_(title){
00022     }
00023 
00024     void start(){
00025         sctime = clock();
00026     }
00027 
00028     void startWithTitle(string title){
00029         setTitle(title);
00030         start();
00031     }
00032 
00033     void end(){
00034         ectime = clock();
00035     }
00036 
00037     void print(){
00038         cout<<title_<<" uses "<<(double)(ectime-sctime)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC <<" sec"<< endl;
00039     }
00040 
00041     void endAndPrint(){
00042         end();
00043         print();
00044     }
00045 
00046     void setTitle(const string& title){
00047         title_ = title;
00048     }
00049 
00050 private:
00051     clock_t sctime, ectime;
00052     string title_;
00053 };

00057 #endif  /* _VTIMER_H */
